column5: I guess I'm getting older, this is our new (used) boat    I held out for a Yami 4 stroke    everyone is having fun    I went for a little exploration mission too    the lake looked great, I grabbed a canoe cached by the shore, no catch, but I think I'll be back    we put the first fish over bow on the boat, a surprise laker on a crank bait    then this gal was looking to fatten back up after the spawn, all fish released
~~~~~I'm see a lot more of those, then what was in the past, a great family boat, with little one, and elderly. You should have years of fun with it.
Seeeeeeeee I TOLD you that lure would work     Now you will be much easier to spot....and what a great rig for comfy trollin
Great weekend. My kids are bugging for a pontoon boat, but I just can't do it......yet. They are comfy rigs, and quite versatile too. I'm sure you'll enjoy it.  S.
Nice boat, it is something we are looking at getting next year, but we are trying to figure out if it's worth it to get.  I may have to follow up with you next year.

that's your exact, favourite lure! it caught the laker, I caught the walleye on a white twister tail though  it seems like a decent lake, the drive is a little far though, are you going to get there this summer?
it's slow with the 25 hp, 20 kph, but super comfy, I think we're going to enjoy it, follow up later if you like
